snippet: A spokesman for Express Scripts said it was taking action against “captive” pharmacies that seemed to be aimed at pushing a single manufacturer’s products.
abstract: Express Scripts sends termination letter to Woodbury, NY, pharmacy Linden Care signaling immediate end to their business relationship; spokesman says action was taken because Linden Care seemed to mostly dispense expensive drugs made by Horizon Pharma; Linden Care sues Express Scripts in retaliation.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for Express Scripts said it was taking action against “captive” pharmacies that seemed to be aimed at pushing a single manufacturer’s products.

headline.main: Express Scripts Cuts Ties to New York Specialty Pharmacy
headline.print_headline: Express Scripts Cuts Ties to a Specialty Pharmacy
